channel.title: What's that? A decent wow private server?
channel.description:
Yes.
If you want to actually play the game at 70, rather than buy everything from vendors and duel for 10 hours a day, come to Devout Endgame. Centered around endgame PVP and PVE.
A server with competent staff - yes, it really exists.
http://devout.servegame.com
Yes, I realise it is highly inconsiderate of me to spam here, considering I left. No, I will not lose sleep over it.
Ticket a GM or PM Mopman or Vincey for instant 70 and some half-decent gear, just tell them you came from Mopar for the special treatment.

item.title: What's that? A decent wow private server?

@juju wrote:

LOCKS ARE OP

Read full topic

item.title: What's that? A decent wow private server?
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

hey i was wondering how can i play on this server, do i need to download a client or what? ive got world of warcraft v2.0.0 or something i downloaded it but i cant play wow cuz my clients outdated… so can someone tell me what to do or how to play on this server… ive NEVER EVER played world of warcraft before, and i wanna play it but not pay.

Read full topic

item.title: What's that? A decent wow private server?
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

[quote=“Swordskid61, post:29, topic:171798”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=231879.msg1989136#msg1989136 date=1199999394]

O man here we go, don’t get people here turned onto WoW ps’s, your going to start a whole new wave of people with no experience at all asking for help with mysql constantly. Oh and just as a defence for the guy with the lvl “73” they are raising the level cap to 80 when the new expansion or w/e comes out(just saying maybe he has a time machine and went forward in time to get lvl 73)

If people were interested in wow private servers, they’d have found them whether I happen to run one or not, no?

I hardly think people sit there and go “oh, well, Mopman has a private server, I want one now”.
[/quote]
Nah, Nobody likes you. (Just kidding :P) but, you’re right, unless an mscper has WoW and now they see Mopman plays too they’ll say: “oshit maybee now i kan geta fr33 items!!!111”[/quote]

Thats my idea failed! PHR33 ST00F PL0X!!!

Read full topic
